divs: sighting detailsi have in my possesion a letter my father wrote my mother.my father is still liviving and very sharp. brief history: born 07- 02 1926 a&e machanic from april-1948-52 in san fran.-1948-52 ual pilot history: 08-1952-dc6- retired flying 08-1987- 747 as 1st officer-ord-sea-nra 1955 flight engineers intl. assoc.- council chairman 1956 - president ( all of ual flight engineeers ) my father was the very 1st co -pilot to ever achieve council chairman of aopa\alpa #12 in or around 1966 ( you guys can verify all this stuff). my father went on to be a sail boat capt. on lake mich. out of chicago. he at one time he was the commadore of the great lakes cruising club out of the chicago yacht club. my father was fortune enough to be asked to be navigator on aboat called ( ranger ) owned at the time by a great american hero named craig welch. who by his heroic action as an usa army ranger at the cliffs of dunkirk went on to become .., despite horrific disabilies , was able to overcome his physical war issues and make good . my father was navigator on this boat and won the chicago to mackinack race in 1976. my father is still living and any one wishing to contact him , he is 84 yrs old and i would appreciate making the a0propriate time with me.
